caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Appellant v. KIRK WILLIAM ROBERTS, Respondent.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Two.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for Clark County, No. 98-8-01353-8, Ronald C. Wilkinson, J. Pro Tem., entered June 18, 1999.

opinion_text.unpublished: Reversed by unpublished opinion per Armstrong, C.J., concurred in by Morgan and Hunt, JJ.Page 1014
